data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  local!isStateOrLocal: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  local!invalidVendorCount: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
    value: cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_INVALID_DATA,
    initialArray: index(
      ri!vendorCountsBasedOnStatus,
      "reconciliationMigrationStatus",
      null
    ),
    finalArray: index(
      ri!vendorCountsBasedOnStatus,
      "totalCount",
      null
    )
  ),
  local!migratedVendorCount: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
    value: cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_MIGRATION_COMPLETED,
    initialArray: index(
      ri!vendorCountsBasedOnStatus,
      "reconciliationMigrationStatus",
      null
    ),
    finalArray: index(
      ri!vendorCountsBasedOnStatus,
      "totalCount",
      null
    )
  ),
  {
    rule!AS_GSS_CRD_customisableBanner(
      primaryIcon: "check-circle",
      primaryIconColor: "#117C00",
      primaryTextColor: "#000000",
      decorativeBarColor: "#E3FBDF",
      cardLayoutStyle: "#E3FBDF",
      headerMessage: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayDynamicLabel(
        bundleKey: "txt_VendorsImportedSuccessfully",
        arguments: local!migratedVendorCount
      ),
      message: "Navigate to the Acquisition Central Vendors page to view all the reconciled vendors.",
      showBorder: false(),
      marginBelow: "LESS",
      showWhen: tointeger(local!migratedVendorCount) > 0
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_CRD_customisableBanner(
      primaryIcon: "info-circle",
      primaryIconColor: "#08088D",
      primaryTextColor: "#000000",
      decorativeBarColor: "#E9EDFC",
      cardLayoutStyle: "#E9EDFC",
      headerMessage: if(
        tointeger(local!invalidVendorCount) > 0,
        rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayDynamicLabel(
          bundleKey: "txt_InvalidVendorData",
          arguments: local!invalidVendorCount
        ),
        "No vendors with invalid data"
      ),
      message: if(
        tointeger(local!invalidVendorCount) > 0,
        "Update vendors with invalid data to include them to the reconciliation and migration process.",
        "All vendors will be included in the reconciliation and migration process."
      ),
      showBorder: false(),
      marginBelow: "LESS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
      label: "Vendor List",
      rowHeader: 1,
      borderStyle: "STANDARD",
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      data: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
      columns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "Name",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
          value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
          width: "MEDIUM"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "UEI",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId,
          helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
            ),
            "-",
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
          ),
          width: "NARROW_PLUS",
          showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "CAGE",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode,
          helpTooltip: "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
            ),
            "-",
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
          ),
          width: "NARROW",
          showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "TIN",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin,
          helpTooltip: "Taxpayer Identification Number",
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin]
            ),
            "-",
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin]
          ),
          width: "AUTO",
          showWhen: local!isStateOrLocal
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "FEIN",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein,
          helpTooltip: "Federal Employer Identification Number",
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein]
            ),
            "-",
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein]
          ),
          width: "AUTO",
          showWhen: local!isStateOrLocal
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "SAM.gov Status",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status,
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
            replacementValue: "-"
          ),
          width: "NARROW",
          showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "Expiration Date",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate,
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
            replacementValue: "-"
          ),
          align: "END",
          width: "NARROW",
          showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "Address",
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
                  char(10)
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
                  input: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
                  char(10)
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
                  input: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
                  char(10)
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
                  input: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateName],
                  char(10)
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
                  input: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateName]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryName],
                  char(10)
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
                  input: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryName]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
                  char(10)
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
                  input: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
                  char(10)
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
                  input: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: "-",
                showWhen: and(
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                    value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
                  ),
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                    value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2]
                  ),
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                    value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity]
                  ),
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                    value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateName]
                  ),
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                    value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryName]
                  ),
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                    value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode]
                  ),
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                    value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt]
                  )
                )
              )
            }
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "Status",
          align: "START",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForFederal,
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
            tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
              text: rule!AS_GSS_DRM_returnReferenceVendorStatus(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForFederal]
              ).statusLabel,
              backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_DRM_returnReferenceVendorStatus(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForFederal]
              ).backgroundColor,
              textColor: rule!AS_GSS_DRM_returnReferenceVendorStatus(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForFederal]
              ).statusColor
            )
          ),
          showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal),
          width: "NARROW"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "Status",
          align: "START",
          sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG,
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
            tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
              text: rule!AS_GSS_DRM_returnReferenceVendorStatus(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG]
              ).statusLabel,
              backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_DRM_returnReferenceVendorStatus(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG]
              ).backgroundColor,
              textColor: rule!AS_GSS_DRM_returnReferenceVendorStatus(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG]
              ).statusColor
            )
          ),
          showWhen: local!isStateOrLocal,
          width: "NARROW"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "",
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionField_v1"(
            showWhen: if(
              local!isStateOrLocal,
              not(
                or(
                  tointeger(
                    fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG]
                  ) = cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_MIGRATION_COMPLETED,
                  tointeger(
                    fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG]
                  ) = cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_RECON_COMPLETED,
                  tointeger(
                    fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG]
                  ) = cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_SKIPPED_RECON
                )
              ),
              not(
                or(
                  tointeger(
                    fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForFederal]
                  ) = cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_MIGRATION_COMPLETED,
                  tointeger(
                    fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForFederal]
                  ) = cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_RECON_COMPLETED,
                  tointeger(
                    fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG]
                  ) = cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_SKIPPED_RECON
                )
              )
            ),
            actions: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionItem"(
                action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:bde9fe6b-9c88-4aff-9758-f9b0d2f4df6a/f2acc433-bec0-45b7-8ace-3989077450ef",
                identifier: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId]
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionItem"(
                action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:bde9fe6b-9c88-4aff-9758-f9b0d2f4df6a/553f946b-3b12-4bf9-9821-ce0cfeabbf5d",
                identifier: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId]
              )
            },
            style: "MENU_ICON",
            display: "LABEL_AND_ICON",
            openActionsIn: "DIALOG",
            align: "CENTER"
          ),
          width: "ICON",
          align: "CENTER"
        )
      },
      validations: {},
      refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
      shadeAlternateRows: true(),
      pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM,
      showRefreshButton: true(),
      initialSorts: if(
        local!isStateOrLocal,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForSLG,
          ascending: true()
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationMigrationStatusForFederal,
          ascending: true()
        )
      ),
      userFilters: #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:0138bd87-14ee-4377-bfc9-182baa8e96d6/5aee8cbe-2510-42b2-8df2-220fcb6f231f",
      refreshOnVarChange: ri!backToDataViewCounter
    )
  }
)

{
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
        labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
        images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(
          document: cons!AS_GSS_DRM_SUCCESS_ILLUSTRATION
        ),
        size: "SMALL",
        align: "CENTER",
        marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",

      ),

      )

    primaryTextColor: "#000000",
    cardLayoutStyle: "#E9EDFC",
    message: "These vendor(s) were not imported because they already exist in Acquisition Central. Check for discrepancies and update if needed.",
    showBorder: false(),

      rule!AS_GSS_UT_checkIfNullOrZero(

            value: cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_RECON_MIGRATION_STATUS_SKIPPED_RECON

      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(

        helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
          ),
          "-",
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
        ),
        width: "NARROW_PLUS",
        showWhen: not(ri!isStateOrLocal)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "CAGE",
        sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode,
        helpTooltip: "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
          ),
          "-",
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
        ),
        width: "NARROW",
        showWhen: not(ri!isStateOrLocal)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "TIN",
        sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin,
        helpTooltip: "Taxpayer Identification Number",
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin]
          ),
          "-",
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin]
        ),
        width: "AUTO",
        showWhen: ri!isStateOrLocal
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "FEIN",
        sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein,
        helpTooltip: "Federal Employer Identification Number",
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein]
          ),
          "-",
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein]

  contents: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
      contents: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: ri!cardImage),

        )
      },
      padding: "NONE",
      style: "#FAFAFC",
      marginBelow: "NONE",
      showBorder: false
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
      contents: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headingField"(
          text: ri!cardHeading,
          size: "SMALL",
          headingTag: "H3",
          fontWeight: "SEMI_BOLD",

        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the value is null, CDT with all null fields, an empty string, string with only spaces, list of null values or an empty list. Otherwise returns false.

data.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios,

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
